title: Baby Billy’s Bible Bonkers
description: A short-lived Christian cultural phenomenon. Buzzing in in the name of the Lord! Where Jesus has the highest score!
altHero: Baby Billy Freeman in a loud white and gold suit holding a microphone
alt1: Billy danging on set with backup dancers
alt2: a family of contestants is introduced in praying poses
alt3: two women face off at the buzzer podium
alt4: Jesse Gemstone screaming in the Hurricane Booth
